name: It's All Connected! (spadekHemoglobiny)
description:
You're an aspiring conspiracy theorist that has gathered materials on 3 individuals and is trying to prove their are up to something. To do so you have to match clues  by using colors as your guide. You also have to be pretty quick because your friends have a very short attention span.

CONTROLS

Left Click to select a Picture and then Left Click again to connect it to one of the 3 colored faces
Right Click to cancel connecting a Picture
